channel.title: Exp Value Help
channel.description:
[b]Exp Value[/b] How do i make it so that when u attack something, u dont gain 20 lvls from hitting a 1? i want to make it like: #hit : exp given 1:4 2:8 3:13 4:16 do u know what i mean? please help me out
thank you [s][i]::kidd618::[/i][/s]

item.title: Exp Value Help
item.dc:creator: @11167 _â„¢
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Search (FightType == 1) and under it should be exp values and formulas, and then also for the other three attack styles.

Read full topic
